Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Transgenic rats with low brain angiotensinogen ( TGR ) were used .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| angiotensinogen |

The only chemical entity in the paragraph is "angiotensinogen". It is a protein that is part of the renin-angiotensin system, which regulates blood pressure and fluid balance.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| angiotensinogen |

The only chemical entity in the paragraph is "angiotensinogen". It is a protein that is part of the renin-angiotensin system, which regulates blood pressure and fluid balance. The other term "transgenic rats" refers to a type of genetically modified organism and not a chemical.
